title: 'Sherlock' to return for special episode and 4th season
text: 'Sherlock' to return for special episode and 4th season Saturday, 24 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) There will be more mysteries to solve for the sleuth of Baker Street. Producers confirm season 4 for 'Sherlock,' set Jan. 1 date for special episode in US and UK ABCNews.com 16 minutes ago - Front Page Also reported by • ANI News The Premier League and La Liga return on Saturday afternoon, and the Tipster is offering new Paddy Power customers enhanced odds of 18/1 on Arsenal, Chelsea and...
